title.en: Prayer for the Spread of the Tradition of Sera Khandro1

text.en: May the tradition of the accomplished vidyādharī and universal sovereign of the ḍākinīs,
text.en-trans: drub nyé rigdzin daki khorlö gyur

text.en: The holder of the ḍākinīs' secret treasury of profound, unprecedented instructions,
text.en-trans: ngönmé dam zab khandrö sangdzö dak

text.en: Spread everywhere, throughout the far reaches of this world, and endure throughout the whole of time.
text.en-trans: ringluk chok tar pel gyé tak khyab shok
